Post-Installation

This section is incomplete and needs further work!

Debloating

  1. Uninstall unwanted software: 

    # apt purge avahi-daemon
# apt purge bluez bluez-firmware
# apt purge modemmanager

  2. Disable unwanted services:
    1. Networking services: 

      # systemctl disable networking.service wpa_supplicant.service

  3. Reboot to apply changes: 

    $ reboot

Configure Network

Ethernet

Wireless

  1. Unblock Wi-Fi: 

    $ rfkill unblock wlan

  2. Configure wpa_supplicant:
    /etc/wpa_supplicant/wpa_supplicant.conf
     
  3. Configure dhcp client:
    /etc/dhcpcd.conf
     
  4. Enable dhcp client service: 

    # systemctl enable dhcpcd.service
